title: CitiBank Font?
content:
Does anyone have any suggestions to which font the fine people at Citi might be using?

Thanks!
author: Peripheral

comments.content:
A three-minute-old member using Bono's real name... Go phish.

No Paul Hewson in Springfield, OH.

Tad

Dude, sorry. i'm not going to give out my real name. Just wondered what the \*\*\*\* Citi font was so that I could complete this logo for my job. Trust me, just needed to know the Citi bank font.

And um, for the record, Paul Hewson is a rather common name. I'm pretty sure (unless you hold the town's census), there could easily be one that lives there.

No need for any anger. Next time please do a Google search of Typophile first; you'd find that the identification of [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322145957/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Interstate) had already been determined.

I'm sorry, why does everyone think I'm "phishing"? And I did do a google search. Couldn't find any help. I do appreciate your help auricfuzz. And to demented & sii, I'm sorry, as a graphic designer, I'd try to get some typography assistance from a website called Typophile. My bad.
